mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO notice_receive_record (id,notice_id, employee_id, update_time, create_time) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.noticeId}, #{item.employeeId}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT nrr.id, nrr.employee_id, nrr.notice_id, nrr.create_time, nrr.update_time from notice_receive_record nrr where nrr.employee_id = #{employeeId} and nrr.notice_id=#{noticeId}
